thread.title: Bristol and Bath's tech wonderland beats Banksy's Dismaland
thread.title_full: Bristol and Bath's tech wonderland beats Banksy's Dismaland

author: Monty Munford
title: Bristol and Bath's tech wonderland beats Banksy's Dismaland
text: Technology News Bristol and Bath’s tech wonderland beats Banksy’s Dismaland As Banksy’s art project Dismaland comes to the end of its run on the Weston-Super-Mare coast this weekend, something more uplifting is happening in the nearby tech hub of Bristol and Bath. Banksy's Dismaland - a collection of satirical art and sculpture Photo: Claire Hayhurst/PA
